eventName: Come Catastrophes or Wakes of Vultures
storyInfo: While on a mission in eastern Columbia, Jessica finds herself separated from the rest of her team. In the blizzard, she remembers the special mission given to her by her boss, 'Clip' Cliff: she must find a man named Woodrow.

attributes.text: They say there's gonna be another attack in about half an hour. You want some water?
Never mind. Look how tense you are. You'd just throw it up anyway... Breathe, breathe... Relax... Where are you from, girl?
Columbia, huh...? Ever heard of Davistown?

No? That's a shame. It's a pretty neat place. Its route takes it around the eastern forests, and the winters are long and cold, but its plate is home to a mine. Keeps its core's energy tower burning the whole time.
Just the heat generated from that keeps everyone warm all winter.

It can get pretty hot indoors, but it's also cold outside, so no matter where you go, as soon as you open the door you get puffs of white steam gushing out toward you. Which condenses on your eyelashes like teardrops.
You have to wipe them off quick, or the kids inside will laugh at you. But that's okay. That's when you fight back. Lift 'em by the armpits and toss them into the thick snowdrifts outside.
Now you get to laugh at all the snow on their faces.
Yeah, it's a great place. Everyone wants to go see it for themselves. And I...
I really want to go back and have a look, too.

attributes.content: Hfff—How is it so damn cold here? I don't get it!
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: How the hell does this even happen? So goddamned cold!
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: Get your ass inside then! If you know it's cold, why're you complaining about it with the door open?
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: I don't want to get the floor dirty.
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: You say that like you can wipe your feet on the snow... Here, hot tea.
attributes.name: Helena
Leone
attributes.content: Pff... That's hot!
...The floor's pretty dirty in the diner today, huh? If I'd known, I would've just walked in.
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: We got some heavy snow. Every time someone steps inside, it just gets dirty again. I'll clean it up after closing.
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: So what're you having? Beans? Bread?
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: What kinda choice is that?
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: It's all we have. If you'd rather have nothing, suit yourself.
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: Can I get a little of both?
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: Fine, seeing how you're my first customer without a few screws loose. I'll even throw in a scoop of butter, on the house.
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: Helena...
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: Now what?
attributes.name: Helena
Leone
attributes.content: Why do you have mud on your chairs—

attributes.name: Leone
attributes.content: Hey you two, this ain't your home. Put your feet down!
attributes.joined: Why do you have mud on your chairs—Hey you two, this ain't your home. Put your feet down!

attributes.content: You talking to us, old man?
attributes.name: Rude Ruffian

attributes.content: *sigh*... Settle down, you two.
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: You stay out of this.
attributes.name: Boorish Brute

attributes.content: Don't be like that. Everyone's here for a hot meal. No need to get physical.
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: Hey, why're you taking his side?
attributes.name: Rude Ruffian

attributes.content: Because I'd rather not see every little quarrel in this joint end in a knife fight.
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: Shut up, or I'll knife you too.
attributes.name: Rude Ruffian

attributes.content: For the love of—
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: Stay out of this, Helena. I'll teach these hoodlums a lesson.
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: Heh, your funeral!
attributes.name: Rude Ruffian

attributes.content: The ruffian takes his knife and steps forward, only for a dinner knife to fly at him from the opposite side and embed itself in the ground near his feet.
You?!
attributes.name: Rude Ruffian

attributes.content: Not another inch, boy. It's late. Go home to your mommy.
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: Right back at you, woman—
attributes.name: Rude Ruffian

attributes.content: Before he can take another step, a second knife brushes past his cheek and lodges itself in the wall behind him.
A few drops of fresh blood drip to the ground.
My ear?!
attributes.name: Rude Ruffian

attributes.content: Stop whining. It's still attached.
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: But I can't promise it'll stay that way unless you scram. Now.
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: The restaurant's proprietor turns around and takes a cloth off the rack to start wiping the bar.
There is another knife wedged between her fingers.
Shit...
attributes.name: Rude Ruffian

attributes.content: Forget it, let's go. We can get them back for this later.
attributes.name: Boorish Brute

attributes.content: Here, your meal.
attributes.name: Helena
Leone
attributes.content: Thanks...

attributes.name: Leone
attributes.content: Yowch! It's hot!
You're about the only person who can burn his tongue twice in one visit.
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: Hey, I was starving. Haven't had a good meal all day. Anyhow, don't you think we've been getting more and more of these thugs in town?
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: Probably because Woodrow's out searching for Miles... So they think nobody's gonna stop them.
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: Hmph... Miles sure knows how to be a pain in the neck. He left the plate without a word to look for fuel, only to disappear without a trace. And now Woodrow's gotta go look for him.
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: What choice did he have? We don't have enough fuel to go around. Besides, it don't matter what he ran into. He can deal with anything, man or beast, in three seconds flat.
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: But what if Woodrow's too late—
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: Alright, enough yapping. Finish your bean stew.
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: *sigh* I'm just worried...
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: Here, it's my last bit of butter. Now shut your trap, will you?
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: Kids, you awake?
attributes.name: Lethargic Female Voice

attributes.content: There may be ambushers in the forest. The recon team has gone ahead to scout the area, and if they need any fire support, we can't just be napping in the transport.
attributes.name: Lethargic Female Voice

attributes.content: So get off your butts, pick up your gear, and cover yourselves. On the count of three.
attributes.name: No-Longer-Lethargic Female Voice

attributes.content: Ugh, my eyes...
attributes.name: No-Longer-Lethargic Female Voice

attributes.content: What's wrong?
attributes.name: Comms

attributes.content: It's the glare from the snow.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: I'm pretty sure I gave you a reminder of what to look out for when fighting in a snowfield. Where are your sunglasses?
attributes.name: Comms

attributes.content: Guess I didn't think it through. Whatever, I'll have to make do with what I have on hand.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: How are things looking up ahead?
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: Patience. The situation's a little tricky right now. The snow's too thick, so it's hard to spot any enemies in hiding. It'll take some time to pinpoint their location.
attributes.name: Comms

attributes.content: *sigh* This was supposed to be a power plant repair job, and now we've gotta clear out bandits, too? Guess I'll just think of it as charity work.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: What do you say, kids?
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: Ready to go.
attributes.name: Blacksteel Operator

attributes.content: Seems my lackeys can't wait anymore, Captain. Can we get in touch with the Davistown officers?
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: They said they'll send someone to meet us at the entrance to the plate, but there's not much they can do in the way of combat support outside.
attributes.name: Comms

attributes.content: Wow, such hospitality. Good to know I won't be getting lost in town, at any rate.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: It's a nearly bankrupt mining platform. We can't ask too much of them.
attributes.name: Comms

attributes.content: They reported the power plant explosion and subsequent fuel leakage to the state government at the start of the year, but nobody cared.
attributes.name: Comms

attributes.content: All things considered, they've dealt with it pretty well. So the pollution hasn't spread much, but the plant itself is almost beyond repair. Certainly more than the locals can handle.
attributes.name: Comms

attributes.content: Hold up. The start of the year? How come they're only contacting us now?
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: You think a tiny municipality has the budget for that? They never spend a dime until they're out of options.
attributes.name: Comms

attributes.content: At the time, the plant could still barely support the platform's movements. A few months ago, it stopped working entirely. Now, I doubt it can provide its most basic function, heating.
attributes.name: Comms

attributes.content: It's minus 14 degrees here...
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: And colder at night.
attributes.name: Comms

attributes.content: So, is it all bad news, or...?
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: Based on the map, Davistown is just up ahead. You should see it as soon as you get out of the woods.
attributes.name: Comms

attributes.content: Anything more exciting?
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: ...Perfect timing. We've located all our targets. You can start clearing them out.
attributes.name: Comms

attributes.content: Lovely.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: One last thing before I hop to it. Where are Jessica and Laura? You send them somewhere?
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: The enemy camp. There's a local being held captive there, without too many guards. It wasn't a good idea to send too big of a force.
attributes.name: Comms

attributes.content: Okay, gotcha. I'll clean this up ASAP.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: Hey. We've been hanging you here for an hour, old man. You thirsty? Need a sip of water?
attributes.name: Cruel Snowfield Bandit

attributes.content: If you ain't saying nothing, that means yes, right?
attributes.name: Cruel Snowfield Bandit

attributes.content: (Picks up a handful of snow from the ground)
attributes.name: Cruel Snowfield Bandit

attributes.content: Here, have as much as you want. No need to thank me.
attributes.name: Cruel Snowfield Bandit

attributes.content: *cough* *cough*, *cough* *cough*...
attributes.name: Miles

attributes.content: Please, let me go. I have nothing on me... *cough* *cough*!
attributes.name: Miles

attributes.content: What're you saying? It's so boring out here in the snow, and we finally run into you! Been a while since I had some fun.
attributes.name: Cruel Snowfield Bandit

attributes.content: Enough messing around. I'd like some peace and quiet, so hurry up and deal with him.
attributes.name: Indifferent Snowfield Bandit

attributes.content: You hear that, old man? You're so loud, you're bothering my buddy here. We gotta shut you up—
attributes.name: Cruel Snowfield Bandit

attributes.content: Ugh...!
attributes.name: Miles

attributes.content: ...Freak.
attributes.name: Indifferent Snowfield Bandit

attributes.content: Everyone else's out ambushing the caravan, and we're stuck here guarding the camp.
attributes.name: Cruel Snowfield Bandit

attributes.content: And when they get back, they'll be loaded with loot, and we'll have to settle for the scraps. You telling me you're okay with that?
attributes.name: Cruel Snowfield Bandit

attributes.content: Tch... If you aren't going to, I'll take care of him myself.
attributes.name: Indifferent Snowfield Bandit

attributes.content: Wh-What are you going to do?!
attributes.name: Miles

attributes.content: Quiet. It'll be over soon.
attributes.name: Indifferent Snowfield Bandit

attributes.content: No!
attributes.name: Miles

attributes.content: Ngh—
attributes.name: Indifferent Snowfield Bandit

attributes.content: Who's there?!
attributes.name: Cruel Snowfield Bandit

attributes.content: Wh-Who are you?
attributes.name: Miles

attributes.content: Shh! Quiet!
attributes.name: Blacksteel Operator

attributes.content: I'm gonna untie you. Keep your voice down and follow me. Can you do that?
attributes.name: Blacksteel Operator

attributes.content: Mm.
attributes.name: Miles

attributes.content: This is Laura. I've secured the hostage. How are things on your end?
attributes.name: Blacksteel Operator

attributes.content: All done, but...
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Are you hurt?
attributes.name: Laura

attributes.content: N-No... but my comms... *bzzt*... broke... It's fine. I can deal with it...
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: *bzzt*... Thanks.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: No need to thank me.
attributes.name: Laura

attributes.content: *bzzt*... Okay.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: I'll take the hostage to the rendezvous point. See you later.
attributes.name: Laura

attributes.content: *bzzt*... later.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: I'm taking you with me!
attributes.name: Stubborn Snowfield Rioter

attributes.content: Coming at me head on? You're one brave fella.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: Urgh—!
attributes.name: Stubborn Snowfield Rioter

attributes.content: That was the last one.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: Reporting in, Captain. All targets neutralized.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: Okay. We're getting ready to leave too. We should be rendezvousing with you in a few minutes. Wait there for Jessica and Laura—
attributes.name: Comms

attributes.content: Hey. Hello? What's going on over there?!
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: There's no need for comms at this distance.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: You just had to come early, huh?
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: Someone once told me that playing pranks after combat can help alleviate stress.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: ...Wow, you're getting better at this.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: I learned from the best.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: The weather here's real temperamental, huh? It was all clear just earlier, but it's already starting to fog up.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: We've checked all your injuries, Mr. Miles. The bruise on your abdomen doesn't seem serious, but I suggest you visit the hospital as soon as can.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Hospital...? Davistown ain't had a hospital in a long, long time.
attributes.name: Miles

attributes.content: Uh... Good. We're heading to Davistown too. We can take you back.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: What are you folks up to there?
attributes.name: Miles

attributes.content: Relax, sir. We were dispatched to help the plate restart its operations.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: We brought some fuel and supplies. They should be enough for the residents to last until the power plant is repaired.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: But... y'all bring any technicians?
attributes.name: Miles

attributes.content: The plant was already on its last legs. Without any technicians, the blasted weather will kill us the moment it goes out for good.
attributes.name: Miles

attributes.content: Calm down, sir. I'm the lead technician on the team. Call me Laura. Nice to meet ya.
attributes.name: Laura

attributes.content: I'm Miles... a Davistown boiler worker.
attributes.name: Miles

attributes.content: Thank you... thank you...
attributes.name: Miles

attributes.content: So, why'd you leave the plate? It's dangerous out here.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: We're almost completely out of fuel, so I came out to try my luck... But if y'all are here to fix the plant, can we get going now?
attributes.name: Miles

attributes.content: One second. Let me ask Jessica where she is.
attributes.name: Laura

attributes.content: Hey, Jessica? It's Laura. You done there?
attributes.name: Laura

attributes.content: *bzzt*... I'm all finished— *bzzt*...
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Then hurry up and get over here—
attributes.name: Laura

attributes.content: Hey? Jessica?
attributes.name: Laura

attributes.content: Jessica?!
attributes.name: Laura

attributes.content: Laura, where are you? I'll head over right now—
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Laura? Hello? Hello?
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Why did the communicator have to break down now of all times...?
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Let me check the coordinates... Where's the camp?
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: How come there isn't so much as a marker? Where am I? I... I'm not lost, am I?
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Calm down. Calm down... You're near Davistown. You aren't far from the plate...
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: I... I guess I'll have to wait for the wind to stop.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Brr... So cold.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Jessica breathes a sigh and puts her hand in her pocket.
Her fingers feel the velvet pouch in her bag, as well as the small, hard object inside.
She takes out the pouch and pours out its contents.
Reporting.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: You, huh?
attributes.name: 'Clip' Cliff

attributes.content: Captain Liskarm encountered a windstorm on her way back and hasn't been able to return to the landship. I'm standing in for her for debriefing.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Have you received the Davistown mission notice?
attributes.name: 'Clip' Cliff

attributes.content: Yes, sir.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: What about the details? Have you read it over yet?
attributes.name: 'Clip' Cliff

attributes.content: We will be heading to Davistown, a mining platform with a small residential area.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: The platform is currently stranded in the forests of eastern Columbia due to a power plant explosion. Our mission is to repair the plant and restore the plate's mobility.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Good. If I remember correctly, the supplies were issued today. What about the follow-up arrangements?
attributes.name: 'Clip' Cliff

attributes.content: That's all it said in our orders.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Never mind... There's no harm in telling you. As soon as Davistown returns to its original route, Fort Barron will be there to tow it to a nearby nomadic city for merging and salvage.
attributes.name: 'Clip' Cliff

attributes.content: Why are you telling me this?
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Jessica, ever since you got back from Victoria, you haven't been putting in as much effort as before.
attributes.name: 'Clip' Cliff

attributes.content: Sir... I'm not sure that's a fair appraisal.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: I've been giving it my all in every mission, and have... fulfilled every mission objective.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Just last month, you refused an order to evacuate an area polluted with Originium dust.
attributes.name: 'Clip' Cliff

attributes.content: There was someone nearby who needed rescuing...
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Half a year ago, during an assault operation, you violated your superior's order and specifically chose a route away from the residential areas. Your entire team almost got caught up in an unnecessary battle.
attributes.name: 'Clip' Cliff

attributes.content: The original plan would have caused significant damage to the local residences... I... I...
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: A year ago, when you had just returned from Victoria, you immediately charged into the command center. If you'd been carrying a firearm, I would've thought you were mutinying.
attributes.name: 'Clip' Cliff

attributes.content: S-Sorry, sir... I wasn't able to control my emotions... but hundreds of Victorian citizens were—
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: I understand your anger, but have you ever considered what would've happened if we hadn't evacuated as soon as possible? If a duke were to find out that Blacksteel, a Columbian company, was in the area?
attributes.name: 'Clip' Cliff

attributes.content: To the countries involved, this would've sparked a 'conflict.' But to normal folks, we'd call that a 'disaster.'
attributes.name: 'Clip' Cliff

attributes.content: That does make sense when you put it like that, but... What does this have to do with our upcoming mission?
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: I'm just trying to remind you to avoid making the same mistake you made in Victoria.
attributes.name: 'Clip' Cliff

attributes.content: The same mistake... What do you mean, exactly?
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: And while you're at it, take this pouch. Give what's inside to a man from Davistown named Woodrow Bianchi.
attributes.name: 'Clip' Cliff

attributes.content: Could you describe him at all? Like, his features or race—
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: No need. You'll know who he is the moment you see him.
attributes.name: 'Clip' Cliff

attributes.content: Sir... I still don't understand. It's just a power plant repair. Why—
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Let me remind you, Jessica. You're a mercenary. This is about business, not duty.
attributes.name: 'Clip' Cliff

attributes.content: Now go.
attributes.name: 'Clip' Cliff

attributes.content: Jessica picks up the bullet that fell from the pouch, and holds it under the sunlight to examine it.
Rimmed cartridge, .44... There's a pattern etched into the bottom.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: No... It's too faint. I can't make it out.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Sankta ammo... looks pretty much like the etched ammo we use at Blacksteel.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: The casing is rusted, and the surface's copper has browned. Even under the direct sunlight, there is hardly any luster.
Jessica breathes a sigh and puts it back inside the pouch.
'Make the same mistake I made in Victoria'...?
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: What's going on in Davistown?
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Suddenly, she hears a sound that isn't the wind.
Don't move, girl.
Not unless you want a bullet through the chest.
